method.name: POST
method.id: Create Kerberos Configuration Property or Subsection
method.doc: To create a Kerberos configuration property with the RESTful web service, issue an HTTP POST command on the Kerberos configuration resource URI.

param.name: Accept:application/json
param.doc: Required for requests to the service

param.name: subsection
param.doc: The name of the new sub-section. This parameter mandatory for creating a subsection.

param.name: name
param.doc: The name of the new property to create. This parameter is mandatory for creating a property.

param.name: value
param.doc: The value of the new property being created. This parameter is mandatory for creating a property. For multi-valued properties this should be an array of values.
